---
title: Indicators
---

```{r library}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(EQRIanalysis)
```

```{r get-data}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

indicators_df <- get_indicators_df()
```


```{r render-indicators}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| message: false

# Dynamically render markdown output for each question
for (indicator_name in levels(indicators_df$INDICATOR)) {
  markdown <- render_indicator(indicators_df, indicator_name)
  cat(markdown, sep = "\n")  
}
```
